content: **crocheted hat in drops muskat the piece is worked with squares size one-size ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-817 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** one-size fits head-size 54-56 cm **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 09 nutmeg 50 g colour 85 mustard 50 g colour 87 pomegranate 50 g colour 92 sweet orchid **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row in height = 10 x 10 cm 1 square measures approx 7 5 x 7 5 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
